long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Fluentify - Easy & Fast Language Translation with Dark Mode and Flag Icons

Fluentify is a powerful Chrome extension designed to make language translation quick, seamless, and visually appealing. Translate text instantly between the world’s most popular languages with a single click. Whether you're reading web content or writing emails, Fluentify ensures you have the translations you need, right at your fingertips.

Key Features:

Instant Translations: Fast and reliable translations for over 25 languages, including English, Spanish, Chinese, Arabic, French, and more.
Flag Icons: Easily switch between languages with national flag icons for a visually intuitive experience.
Dark Mode: Toggle between light and dark mode for a comfortable reading and translation experience at any time.
Smooth Animations: Enjoy a polished user interface with smooth hover animations, rounded corners, and gradient titles.
User-Friendly Interface: Simple design ensures that anyone can use it without hassle. Perfect for students, travelers, and professionals.
Boost your productivity with Fluentify and access fast translations without ever leaving your browser tab. Ideal for frequent web users, professionals working in multilingual environments, or anyone looking to learn new languages.

Download Fluentify now and translate like a pro!
